description.value:
One of your forebears hailed from a celestial realm, or your ancestors' devotion led to their lineage being blessed.

Spell Listdivine
Bloodline SkillsDiplomacy, Religion
Granted Spellscantrip @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Light]{Light}, 1st: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal}, 2nd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Spiritual Weapon]{Spiritual Weapon}, 3rd: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Searing Light]{Searing Light}, 4th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Wrath]{Divine Wrath}, 5th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Flame Strike]{Flame Strike}, 6th:@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Blade Barrier]{Blade Barrier}, 7th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Decree]{Divine Decree}, 8th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Divine Aura]{Divine Aura}, 9th: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Foresight]{Foresight}
Bloodline Spellsinitial: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Angelic Halo]{Angelic Halo}, advanced: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Angelic Wings]{Angelic Wings}, greater: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Celestial Brand]{Celestial Brand}
Blood MagicAn angelic aura protects you or one target, granting a +1 status bonus to saving throws for 1 round.
